titles.title: An original joint resolution designating April 3, 1987, as "Interstate Commerce Commission Day".

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Commerce. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Hollings with a preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 30.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary by unanimous consent.

bill.summary: 3/10/1987--Introduced. Designates April 3, 1987, as Interstate Commerce Commission Day.
